Name: Outright
About the game: It is a 2D, linear, sprite platformer with RPG elements. Features The character has a different moveset that, when combined wisely, can achieve high efficiency. Combat moves Melee attack Range attack Parry Stomp Acrobatic moves Jump Double jump Wall jump Dash The game has a minor element of RPG designed as upgrades, which are gained for points knocked out of enemies. Upgrades Increasing maximum amount of health points and energy cartridges Healing (both active and passive) Several types of projectiles You can only upgrade between levels. The game can be played without upgrades, but this will significantly increase the difficulty during the playing.
Meta Title: Outright: Mar 31, 2021, Ark1nai and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Outright? Check out the release date (Mar 31, 2021), developer insights from Ark1nai, and a complete game summary.
